Update 0.0.1 (25/4/14)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Kerbaladies and Kerbalmen, allow me to introduce to you the Kerbal Mod Assistant.

This utility will allow you to maintain multiple versions of the same mod between games without having to copy and paste them in and out yourself. I (would) like to be able to easily switch between my career and sandbox games and in doing so switch out a few mods (like RemoteTech) to make the game easier or harder.

It is not ready for download yet, but everything you see in the screenshot is already working.

Implemented Features:

  • Ability to keep multiple versions of one mod
  • Ability to load or unload mods to KSP/GameData
  • Dynamic per-mod configuration file

Planned Features:

  • Maintain a savefile directory
  • Load/unload mods based on config file for selected save
  • Change mod version in use per save file
  • Mods can have dependencies (ie. will not work without Toolbar)
  • Download mod updates (for mods with a direct download option (no Spaceport, requires GitHub or similar))

I'm open to suggestions regarding additional features.
If there is anything I can do, I'd love to help. I do a bit of Java, not much though.
